body:
## Tip :zap: ##
One UX feature we can consider is to center marker when its active on `click` to provide better UX.

One way to do this is to use `panTo` method.
To implement this, study [this Simple `click` Event by Google](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/examples/event-simple)

### Code Quality ###
This code block has inconsistent indentation
